hero.title: Eligible Conditions
hero.subtitle: At Healing Buds, we see patients when prescribed cannabis is an appropriate treatment option. Medical cannabis can be prescribed for a wide range of conditions where other treatments have failed.
hero.note: If your condition is not listed below, please get in touch. We may still be able to help.

noResults: No conditions found matching your search. Please try a different search term or contact us for assistance.

cta.title: Don't see your condition listed?
cta.subtitle: We may still be able to help. Contact our team to discuss your specific condition and treatment options.
